name: ElevenLabs
description: AI audio research and deployment company specializing in natural-sounding text-to-speech (TTS), voice cloning, sound effects generation, and AI dubbing, accessible via web interface and API.
features: Projects workflow for long-form content creation
Support for multiple languages and accents

pricing.free_tier: 10,000 characters (credits) per month, create up to 3 custom voices, non-commercial use license.
pricing.notes: Pricing is based on character usage (credits). API usage deducts credits from the plan allowance. Check website for current credit calculation details.

use_cases.title: Content Creation
use_cases.description: Generate voiceovers for videos, podcasts, audiobooks, and presentations.
use_cases.example: Converting a blog post script into an audio narration using a chosen voice.

use_cases.title: Accessibility
use_cases.description: Provide audio versions of written content for visually impaired users.
use_cases.example: Integrating TTS into a website to read articles aloud.

use_cases.title: Chatbots & Virtual Assistants
use_cases.description: Give voice capabilities to AI agents and customer service bots.
use_cases.example: Using the API to generate spoken responses for a customer support chatbot.

use_cases.title: Game Development
use_cases.description: Create character voices and sound effects for video games.
use_cases.example: Generating unique alien voices or background ambiance sounds.

use_cases.title: Dubbing & Localization
use_cases.description: Translate and dub video content into different languages.
use_cases.example: Using the AI Dubbing feature to create a Spanish version of an English tutorial video.

pros: API access available on all plans (including free)
Supports a wide range of languages
Continuous development and addition of new features (e.g., sound effects, dubbing)
cons: Credit-based pricing can be complex to predict for variable usage
Free tier is limited to non-commercial use
Voice cloning technology raises potential ethical concerns if misused
Professional Voice Cloning requires higher tiers

supported_languages: 29 languages (as of late 2024, check docs for current list)

performance_metrics.latency: Low latency options available via API/Websocket
performance_metrics.throughput: Subject to API rate limits based on plan
performance_metrics.accuracy: High fidelity voice replication and TTS accuracy

scalability: Designed for scalability via API and tiered plans.

training_resources.description: Updates, guides, and research from ElevenLabs.
Guide to making first API requests.

security_compliance.data_protection: Standard data privacy practices. See Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
